text: Remember this from project x zone
author: BaoZakeruga

text: Probably not. The Dreamcast saw four mainline Sakura Wars games: Remakes of 1 & 2, as well as new installments 3 & 4, with the remakes both hitting within a year of the system's launch. The system also saw no fewer than five spinoff titles and a pink Sakura Taisen-themed console. While the games sold well, they weren't enough to buoy the system amid general mis-management and the threat of the PS2.
author: Samantha Ferreira

text:
A remake of the first game on the Sega Saturn. This series is very popular in Japan, the video games usually are strategy RPGs mixed with dating sim elements. I haven't played this one myself, but I've always been a fan of this theme.

And also a reminder to send me video game related photos (check the last video) for #1000, I've already received a lot and they're looking great !
